title: OISY Sprinkles
oneLiner: Experience the thrill of OISY Sprinkles! Stay active by logging in and making transactions to earn tokens, giving you more opportunities to make the OISY experience even more rewarding.
description:
Meet simple weekly requirements. Log in, make two transactions, and hold at least $20 in tokens to stay eligible for one of 50 BTC drops every day.
Now with referral rewards: invite a friend to deploy a wallet and earn 10% of their Sprinkles for 30 days. They keep 100% - you earn extra.
requirements: Hold $20 worth of tokens at the time of issuance
